comment: /**  * Configures XML based CamelContext with the given configuration  *  * @param applicationContext the Spring context  * @param camelContext       the XML based CamelContext  * @throws Exception is thrown if error during configuration  */
code: /**  * Configures XML based CamelContext with the given configuration  *  * @param applicationContext the Spring context  * @param camelContext       the XML based CamelContext  * @throws Exception is thrown if error during configuration  */ void configure(ApplicationContext applicationContext, SpringCamelContext camelContext) throws Exception.
